arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca says Club World Cup is still affecting Chelsea after Qarabag draw
arts.sum: The final of the tournament, which Chelsea won 3-0 against Paris St Germain, was played only five weeks before the start of the Premier League season.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca blames Club World Cup for Chelsea's failure to beat Qarabag after the Blues boss heavily rotated in the Champions League once again
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL IN BAKU: The statistics say Maresca has made 85 changes in total to his starting line-ups this season and averages up to six tweaks per match - more than any other Premier League manager.

arts.ttl: Qarabag 2-2 Chelsea: The 'harsh lessons' Enzo Maresca's side will learn, Romeo Lavia faces another setback - and which Blues star struggled?
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL: Before this Champions League clash, the transfer boffins told us their supercomputer had calculated how Chelsea's Estevao Willian is worth Â£103.9million in today's market.

arts.ttl: Qarabag 2-2 Chelsea Stats: Blues Forced to Settle for Point in Azerbaijan

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca gamble backfires as Chelsea hit by injury blow in embarrassing Qarabag draw
arts.sum: QARABAG 2-2 CHELSEA: Alejandro Garnacho notched a second half goal to spare the Blues blushes on a chastening Champions League night for Enzo Maresca and Co in Baku

arts.ttl: Garnacho strikes but Chelsea held in Azerbaijan by Qarabag
arts.sum: Chelsea were held 2-2 by Azerbaijan champions Qarabag in the Champions League as Enzo Maresca's young side showed yet more inconsistencies.

arts.ttl: Chelsea Player Ratings vs. Qarabag: Sub-Par Blues Stunned on 5,000-Mile Trip
arts.sum: Chelsea failed to inspire during an underwhelming performance in Azerbaijan.

arts.ttl: Qarabag 2-2 Chelsea: Blues come from behind to rescue draw in Baku
arts.sum: The Blues had never conceded in two previous meetings with the Azerbaijani champions
